markdownRemark.excerpt: You want to write a blog, or maybe you already have one, and the topic you want to write about has been covered. Maybe it has been written about many times. So…
markdownRemark.html:
You want to write a blog, or maybe you already have one, and the topic you want to write about has been covered. Maybe it has been written about many times. So, you feel there is nothing new to say. Or, perhaps, you are intimidated because you don’t believe you can write about the topic as well as the other person/people did.

Write anyway!

You will bring a new perspective to the topic. Everyone has a different experience. Even the slightest nuance to an approach or writing can bring a significantly new way of thinking to others.

Also, writing from your perspective now may help reinforce what you know or be a good reminder to yourself down the road.

Go write that post and share it with the world. You just might help someone who is struggling find the way over their own hurdles.

frontmatter.title: Nothing New To Say
frontmatter.description: What I want to write about has already been said
